titleStmt.title: The repaire of honour, falsely impeached by Featlye a minister Wherein (by occasion) the apostles disciple S. Ignatius Bishop & martyr, his religion, against Protestantisme, is layd open. By Ed. Weston Doctour of Theology: in a letter, by him written vnto two fathers of the Society of Iesvs, in England.
titleStmt.author: Weston, Edward, 1566-1635.

titleStmt.title: The repaire of honour, falsely impeached by Featlye a minister Wherein (by occasion) the apostles disciple S. notesStmt.note: Actual place of publication and press from STC.
A reply to: Featley, Daniel. The Romish fisher caught and held in his own net.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
